text: Fan Changmao (born April 8, 1963) is a male former Chinese international table tennis player. He won a gold medal at the 1983 World Table Tennis Championships in the team event. He also won two bronze medals in the men's doubles with He Zhiwen and the mixed doubles with Jiao Zhimin at the 1985 World Table Tennis Championships. He also won an English Open title. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Chinese male table tennis players Category:Table tennis players from Beijing Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Fan Changmao
